about_the_game: The soundtrack features 26 atmospheric tracks by Game Director Björn Pankratz in wav and mp3 formats. Enjoy the music of ELEX II now on your favorite music player.
detailed_description: The soundtrack features 26 atmospheric tracks by Game Director Björn Pankratz in wav and mp3 formats. Enjoy the music of ELEX II now on your favorite music player.
